user_question: What are the basic rules of rugby and generate an image of a rugby match?
final_answer: Basic rules of rugby: Two teams of 15 players each, aim to score points by carrying, passing, kicking the ball to the opponent's end zone. Points can be scored via tries, conversions, penalty kicks, and drop goals. Image of a rugby match generated. Rugby positions include forwards (props, hooker, locks, flankers, number eight) and backs (scrum-half, fly-half, centers, wings, fullback).
